title: Virgin Islands National Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Entrance Fees  There is no fee to enter either Virgin Islands National Park or Virgin Islands Coral Reef National Monument.  Trunk Bay Day Pass      Trunk   Amenities Fee   Individual Day Pass $5    Individual Annual Pass $20    Family Annual Pass $30    America the Beautiful Pass $15    Senior Pass  $15    Access or Military Pass Free      Mooring & Anchoring (From 5 p.m. to 7 a.m.)    Overnight Boat  $26      Overnight Anchoring (2 locations only)  $26   Senior  $13   Access or Military Costs Free     Overnight Stay Limits: 7 nights per bay, no more than 30 nights per year.    Payment Stations are Located at:     Cruz Bay Finger Pier Leinster Bay    Caneel Bay Watersports Shop  Saltpond Bay    Hawksnest Bay  Great Lameshur Bay    Francis Bay         Overnight fees must be paid prior to spending the night.  For more information on moorings, boating, and best places to snorkel visit the Marine Visitor Use page.   2016 Fee-Free Days    January 18 - Martin Luther King Jr. Day April 16-24 - National Park Week  August 25 - 28 - National Park Service Birthday  September 24 - National Public Lands Day  November 11 - Veterans Day  Fee Free days only Apply to Trunk Bay Fees These entrance fee-free days are applicable at all national park sites in 2016.  To find out more about National Park Fee-Free days visit Fee Free Parks.
